short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The first All in one Popup for your e-mails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension enables users to send emails directly from a pop-up without leaving their current tab. It offers customizable templates that streamline email composition, saving time and improving communication.

What we offer:

	•	Supports Outlook and Google email accounts
	•	Send emails with multiple recipients (To, Cc, Bcc)
	•	Customizable template gallery for various scenarios
	•	Easy email composition without switching tabs
	•	User-centric design focused on speed and convenience
	•	AI-generated email suggestions for efficient communication
	•	Manage recipients and save frequently used templates

Coming Soon:

	•	Vortexi AI - Compose Emails with AI: Automatically generate content for your emails.
	•	Bigger Email Template Gallery: More templates for every scenario.
	•	Email Blocks: Use pre-designed components like openings, body sections, and closings to structure emails with ease.
